20150221.change: Start work on new Flashii backend using leftover BBBB2.

20150308.change: Slight changes to the templating system.
Add Configuration class for better configuration management.
Start work on expanding the templates.

20150321.change: Change entire system to static classes.
Add more features to SQL library.

20150329.change: Login forms not showing when user is logged out.
Add login form below the header.
Add common PHP function template tags.
Add function to get a user's database row.
Add function to get a group's database row.
Add function to get a certain amount of news posts.
Add avatar and background serving PHP script.

20150330.change: Make getting news posts less heavy on the SQL server.

20150401.change: Remove GZIP compression (for now) relating to issues with the error handler.
Remove affiliates section from the footer.

20150402.change: Add hardcoded dummy group and user.
Make the markdown parsing function actually have access to the class.

20150406.change: Open source'd and repository now hosted on GitHub.
Update SQL structure and mistake in .htaccess.

20150408.change: More work on the authentication pages.

20150412.change: Fix massive mistake causing all hashes to break.
Add a function to get users by the IP assigned to their user.

20150413.change: Remove static locations from CSS files.

20150414.change: Add function if the e-mail address used has a valid MX-Record.
Add checking if an IP originates from CloudFlare and then replace the IP with the proper one set in the header.

20150417.change: Add delete function to SQL library.

20150418.change: Add function to get country code from CloudFlare header.

20150420.change: Fix bug in registration process causing username cleaning to fail.

20150421.change: Add e-mail sanitising to registration process.
Add automatic activation e-mail resend function.
Remove PayPal API since we don't need it for what we do.

20150424.change: Make header login form properly responsive.
Remove method of determining password strength based on length (aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa ain't strong just because it's long).
Make logged in users unable to view the authentication page.

20150425.change: Make users with the legacy algorhythm force-change their password.
Remove development tools from the repository.
Fix the backend not expecting an empty users table.

20150426.change: The system thinking 0 is the rank ID for deactivated while it's 1.

20150427.change: Begin work on profile system.
Created function to get profile data from a user.
Made profile data display properly.
Fix rank title not displaying on profiles.
Show country name on profile.
Show tenshi tag on user's profile if they're tenshi.
Actually update last online date.
Activation broken methods in the activation process.
Add glow around a user's avatar on their profile if they're online or offline (active in the last 5 minutes).
Show all online users on the frontpage.
Fix JavaScript forms not submitting on hitting enter.
Fix chat redirect.
Fixed bug in registration process causing a PDO Exception.
Fixed bug in rank checking (e.g. system saying that you're activated and deactivated at the same time).
Fixed the enter substitute not working on some forms.
Fixed activation system assigning incorrect rank after clicking the link.
Fixed off-site account links being displayed to guests.
Fixed /u/[username] not working.
Fixed bug caused by bug fix in login process (ironic).
Fixed bug in rank checking function (didn't decode the json string).
Fixed Canada not existing.
Fixed profiles not showing profile data to logged in users.
Fixed Youtubetype 1 displaying the channel ID as the link title.
Hide most of the profile if a user is deactivated.
Add avatar replacement for deactivated users.
Redid avatar serving script.
Hide abyss'd users.
Remove origin check on CloudFlare country header.
Add members page.
Add members page pagination.
Fix long usernames exceeding the rectangle view.
Abyss'd users showing up in the member list.
Abyss'd user's names still showing up in the title of the profile.

20150428.change: Removed remains of old templating system.
Move Sock Chat permissioning to database as opposed to a static file.

20150429.change: Fix chat online users counter on frontpage.

20150504.change: Removed blank background for inactive users (will make the backend handle removal).
Add beginning parts of the warning systems.

20150505.change: getWarnings() can now return all warnings when the first parameter is false.
Added parallax effect to profile backgrounds.
Added comments to the Yuuno JavaScript.
Export new SQL structure (and example data).

20150506.change: Add some content retrieval functions for the forum.
Added post count to the users table structure.
Moved panel on the right site of the index to its own template file.

20150509.change: Fixed missing newline in a template file.
Added function to actually create notifications.
Compactise (not a word but you get the meaning) array adding in the server-side notification system.
Fixed some redundancy in the news viewer.
Fix a wrong way of assigning notifications to a user (Session::$userId instead of $user).
Replace .cfg files and parser with the built in .ini parser.

20150512.change: Fix {{ sakura.currentpage }} redirecting to the php file that's being used without the right attributes.
Rebuilt news XML to be more modular as opposed to a pile of prints.

20150523.change: Move Manage and Forum to a subdirectory instead of a subdomain.
Add links to forum and management pages.
Fixed broken links because of the domainset changes.

20150524.change: Move site description and tags to the config.
Moved Members button to the user part of the header menu and added a link to search.
Redid scroll to top button and added a cute little animation to it.
Removed unused code for error logging.
Added flag to login function that doesn't set cookies.
Added a method to checkLogin to bypass cookies.
Made the manage footer sticky to the bottom.

20150525.change: Made the registration recaptcha refresh upon failure.
Added a JavaScript port of the password entropy function.
Made maximum and minimum username length configurable.
Split Yuuno CSS up in multiple files.
Changed the icons displayed on the side of the index when logged out.
Added JavaScript form checking to registration form.
Added smooth scroll to top thing.
Fixed subnet matching causing an error.

20150529.change: Added beginning bits for the permissioning system.
Altered details of the built in fallback user a bit.
Fixed feedback redirect going to a deleted forum.
Removed all jQuery dependencies in ybabstat.
Fix issue with GZIP compression in the error handler.
Remove chat from the global permissions (for now) and restore the old permissions table.
Add base for a novelty Mio template port.

20150530.change: Compress Yuuno back to one CSS file again.
Added configuration option to enable template caching.
Fixed logged out users inherit permission strings from random user groups.

20150604.change: Redid some of the users table structure.
Add /header to profile for spooky things.

20150619.change: Added notification history section contents to settings panel.

20150620.change: Fixed settings page being usable when logged out.
Removed remaining code for the old profile API.

20150621.change: Changed the options next to the avatar on the index panel.

20150627.change: Put the Forum Listing and Front Page in the same PHP file as they both request nearly identical info (only difference is probably news post/forum posts).
Changed the die() in the version checker to a trigger_error().
Fixed an error in the password reset process.
Made some of the functions in the Configuration class more readable.

20150628.change: Removed getUserProfileData() which decodes the json in the userData column and do it in the getUser() function.
Fixed all (found) bugs related to the previously listed change.
Fixed bug in the friends system where getFriends() only returns one friend.

20150629.change: Added topic and post counters to the frontpage.
Changed SAKURA_VTYPE to a SAKURA_STABLE boolean that can be used for only showing things on stable or development builds.

20150701.change: Added automatic rank management for premium.
Moved expire variable for the complete page out of the url and take the data straight from the database.
Made the maximum amount of month you get buy premium for changable.

20150702.change: Fixed a mistake in the stylesheet causing the support page to deform when resized.
Made the sitename config variable shown on the title of the suport page instead of just Flashii

20150703.change: Add basic example of the version 1 API framework.

20150704.change: Fixed profile rewrite rule causing errors in some environments (e.g. Win32).
Removed ignore lines for Misaki files.

20150705.change: Added count functionality to database wrapper.
Make forum index page fully functional.
Add user data and post linking to viewforum.
Fix bug while decoding the country name JSON with systems that don't default to UTF-8.
Removed some columns and replaced them with live stats.
Add code for topic view counter.
Fixed avatars with shit resolutions jumping to the side of the username.

20150706.change: Added pending friend requests counter to the frontpage.

20150707.change: Added post and topic count variable to the profile.

20150725.change: Make the error in getConfig return the value that can't be found.

20150728.change: Made the amount of news posts loaded on the frontpage configurable.

20150730.change: Use the same date() formatting everywhere.
Replaced money_format function with number_format due to incompatibility with certain platforms.
Fixed calculation of remaining premium tag.
Fixed &expire=<timestamp> still being in the url when purchasing premium.
Fixed background colours on the search page looking slightly mentally challenged.

20150731.change: Fixed an issue with linking to people's websites on the credits page.
Implemented global pagination style on member list page.
Removed mention of Flashii in news page title.
Fixed positioning bug on the notification history page.
Added pagination to notification history page.
Fixed removing a friend not removing the request.
Fixed pending friend requests function returning mutual friends instead of requests.

20150809.change: Fixed homepage friends link going to the wrong location.
Fixed links to GitHub links to link to their BitBucket alternative.
Added responsive view for notification for smaller screens.
Fixed old avatars not getting deleted.
Fixed references to old urls variable.

20150810.change: Attempt to fix error while trying to get the old avatar name.
Removed legacy password hash support, if your account still uses this method request a password reset email.
Use "Revision" instead of "Build" on the changelog.
Show person that made the change in the changelog.
Make AJAX object generator more convenient.
Fixed user actions showing up when logged out on viewtopic.
Added AJAX friend actions on viewtopic.
Fixed user actions showing up for deleted users.
Removed the function for changing password using a legacy pass.
Fixed usage of wrong variable to check if user is online on the profiles.

20150811.change: Remove unneeded rules from .htaccess in the content folder.
Fixed error caused by users table being empty on front page.
Added dynamicness(?) to the profile editing section.

20150813.change: Fixed some broken links on manage.
Add permission check when trying to enter manage.

20150818.change: Add username shadow based on the user's username colour.

20150819.change: Only make the SQL library fetch an associative array since the numbered one is not used anywhere.
Fixed the lie in the previous change changing the __only__ use of it to associative.
Begin work on a User class (different from the Users class) to easily get a user's data in a usable state.
Fixed incorrect counting on the List view in the memberlist (how did I miss this for 4 months?).
Converted profile.php to the new user API.
Added OR statement capabilities to the database library.
Make it possible to initialise a User object with the username_clean of that user.
Switched currently logged in user data to the new API and fixed some references to checkLogin.
Added expirimental site wide profile background feature.
Clean up unneeded things from profile.php.

20150820.change: Cleaned up the sakura template variable.
Fixed font on changelog not displaying correctly.
Made the "Enable JavaScript" message look a bit less mentally challenged.

20150821.change: Moved image serving file to the new user api.
Changed /r/ urls to /p/ to not have it be confused with subreddit.
Added new options menu (replaces site wide background checkbox).
Fixed an ancient issue where the avatar in the header leaves its containers.
Split the SQL fetch function up into select and fetch functions for possible future use.
Fixed values of additional profile values not showing up properly.
Added banner to footer on unstable revisions.
Added a fallback to the User class that checks using a LIKE statement.
Implemented permission checking for all the settings in the Aesthetics category.
Fixed youtubetype being ignored on the profile.
Switched to a less disgusting purple for the selection of user boxes.
Fixed sitewide background making text on Members page unreadable.

20150822.change: Fixed premium purchasing being broken somehow.

20150823.change: Removed a reference to the legacy password hashing method in Users::checkLogin().
Added repeated linear gradient to the JavaScript message because I could.
Fixed broken reference to current page variable in the logout link.
Add special cases for restricted users.
Fixed checkboxes not working properly in the AJAX submission function.
Add user controlled ability to switch to Misaki.
Quickly backport the required templates to switch back to the Yuuno template.

20150825.change: Moved profile templates to own folder.

20150828.change: Did a plethora of changes to Misaki.
Cleaned up the code for the front page stats.

20150829.change: Fixed PHP version checker not halting the script entirely.
Make placeholder avatars different based on the templates.

20150831.change: Changed main navigation to font awesome icons.
Fixed bug in settings panel with parent sections.
Updated twig libraries and switched to the unmodified Parsedown branch.

20150902.change: Fixed menu width on smaller monitors.
Made the dropdowns in the memberlist usable on phones.
Removed special styling on support us button.

20150903.change: Moved donation tracker functions to Main class.
Added a link to the tracker on the support page.
Fixed All Members view on the memberlist not remembering the view option.
Created two new classes for future use (news and comments).
Make unknown countries return XX instead of EU.

20150904.change: Removed credits page in favour of a markdown file in the root.
Removed the special URL case for the messages section.

20150905.change: Fully fixed the user numbering bug on the List view.
Added a configuration value to change how many users are displayed on the memberlist per page.
Made the payment cancelled message look less odd.
Fixed out of line padding on info pages.
Use Twig Blocks instead of Includes.
Fixed parallax disabling not working on Yuuno.
Implemented Urls class in PHP files.
Dropped SockChat class and rely on system permissions from Sock Chat permissions.
Implemented IP checking in the session manager.

20150906.change: Add ability to hide certain settings modes from the menu.
Gave the error handler a massive update.
Fixed restricted.tpl not being referenced properly.

20150907.change: Fixed cookie notification reappearing after accepting.
Fixed infopage templates not using the new blocks method.
Removed the _developer_data folder, split the SQL structure and data up into two files respectively and moved the Sock Chat auth script to a new directory.
Fixed newline causing an error in CloudFlare check.
Moved document title setting to templates instead of in the PHP file.
Restyle explosive notifications and make them not explosive.

20150908.change: Removed ability to switch to Misaki through the site options (it's currently very broken).
Hide Groups menu from the Settings page as the backend functionality is delayed until after the first stable.
Fixed checkboxes not doing what they're supposed to do.
Made dates on profile a bit more readable.

20150909.change: Renamed main folder to public since we're not using a subdomained system anymore.
Removed the striped bar on the footer due to (obvious) negative feedback.
Made error logger log Sakura version.

20150910.change: Made notification pulling stop when the tab isn't selected.

20150911.change: Migrate more user object references to the new API.
Add missing $data = null to the count database method.
Directly count index statistics from the database as opposed to retrieving an array and counting that.
Make the legacy getUser function reference the new API.
Moved index news posts over to the new API.

20150912.change: Moved pagination to self-contained template file.
Moved news section over to new API.

20150913.change: Rewrote code for scroll to top button.
Added (commented out) beginnings of on-site chat interface.
Added Windows no cron task method.
Added Linux no cron task method.
Remove old notifications after a month.

20150914.change: Make indentation style PSR2 standard compliant.
Fixed error on profile page relating to forum stats.

20150915.change: Fixed session cookies remaining after session dying, a more wholesome fix would require refactoring the session system so that's on the todo list now.
Fixed friendslisting on Settings frontpage being broken.

20150916.change: Begin implementation of new comment system.
Fix AJAX submitted forms using a strange behaviour.
Removed CORS from the notification system since we're not using subdomains anymore.
Fixed usertitle page having Username as the title.
Fixed user class related issues in the forum.
Fixed reference to users class in permissions class.
Added more templates for the settings page.

20150918.change: Changed report flag to an exclamation thing.

20150919.change: Removed Main::jsonPretty in favour of the built in PHP version.

20150923.change: Redirect a new user to /p/welcome on first login.
